Package BrickDestroyFX.Model

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroyFX.Model.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
Define General Properties of Bricks , Will be used by Clay,Cement and Cement Bricks.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DEF_CRACK_DEPTH

    Brick right impact set at 400

    brick up impact set at 100

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, javafx.geometry.Point2D pos, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D size, javafx.scene.paint.Color border, javafx.scene.paint.Color inner, int strength)
      Define general properties of bricks.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the brick
      pos - x and y coordinates of the brick
      size - width and height of the bricks
      border - brick's border color
      inner - brick's inner color
      strength - brick's strength

      public boolean setImpact​(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int dir)
      identify whether ball touches brick
      Parameters:
      point - x and y coordinates of the brick
      dir - which direction
      Returns:
      false if no impact and broken if there is impact
